code: import{createNavigationContainerRef}from"@react-navigation/native";export const navigationRef=createNavigationContainerRef();export function navigate(name,params){if(navigationRef.isReady()){navigationRef.navigate({name,params});}else{console.warn("Navigation attempted before navigationRef was ready");}}export function reset(state){if(navigationRef.isReady()){navigationRef.reset(state);}else{console.warn("Navigation reset attempted before navigationRef was ready");}}
